alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued March 08 at 3:26AM HST until March 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... .A very large northwest swell will build today and peak tonight into early Thursday. The combination of large wind waves from strong west winds and a mix of medium and longer period swell energy will produce very rough and hazardous conditions into Thursday. The swell will gradually decline and shift out of the north- northwest Friday through the weekend. ...HIGH SURF WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves building to 30 to 40 feet along north facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai, and Maui, and waves of 20 to 30 feet along west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai. * WHERE...Portions of Kauai, Maui, Molokai, Niihau and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Thursday. * IMPACTS...High. Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
